org.purewidgets.client.widgets
Class GuiListBox

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
              org.purewidgets.client.widgets.GuiWidget
                  org.purewidgets.client.widgets.GuiListBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClickHandler, HasAttachHandlers, EventHandler, HasHandlers, EventListener, HasVisibility, IsRenderable, IsWidget, InputFeedbackListener, InputListener, ReferenceCodeListener
public class GuiListBox
extends GuiWidget
implements ClickHandler

A widget that presents a list of choices to the user. The ListBox may allow multiple selections or provide a mutually-exclusive set of choices.

CSS Style Rules

.instantplaces-GuiListBox
the outer element
.instantplaces-GuiListBox-disabled
the outer element, when disabled
.instantplaces-GuiListBox .item
the item outer element
.instantplaces-ListBox .item .title
the title element
.instantplaces-ListBox .item .label
the label of the option
.instantplaces-ListBox .item .referencecode
the reference code of the option

Author:
Jorge C. S. Cardoso
